Name: Move 'n' Bloom
About the game: Did you know that if you match at least two cute square shaped beings by color then you get at least two fields with grass and flowers in the same color. No!? Now you know. Move 'n' Bloom is a simple but also challenging puzzle game about moving, pushing and matching colors. But watch out! It gets harder than it looks ;) Key Features Over sixty handcrafted puzzles Non-linear world map Match mechanic based on whole 3 colors Moving, pushing, combining, cloning, sticking and of course matching! Very handy scrolls of incomplete knowledge
